title: What’s Behind the Surge in Refugees Crossing the Mediterranean Sea
body:
About 450 migrants disembarked from an Italian Navy ship in Augusta, Sicily, on Wednesday after being rescued from the Mediterranean Sea.

Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
summary: About 450 migrants disembarked from an Italian Navy ship in Augusta, Sicily, on Wednesday after being rescued from the Mediterranean Sea.Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
